name: Superfeedr Ping Thing
description: A simple endpoint for a Github webhook which triggers a Superfeedr ping.

HUB_URL.description: URL of your Superfeedr Hub, e.g. http://yourusername.superfeedr.com

FEED_URL.description: URL to your feed on your site, e.g. http://christophh.net/atom.xml

HOOK_SECRET.description: Secret which was configured in the Github Webhook settings
